mapper.insert: insert into sitevrhd (div, reportno, status) value (#{div}, #{reoortno}, #{status})
mapper.delete: delete from sitevrhd where div=#{div} and reportno=#{reportno}
mapper.select: SELECT a.div as div, a.reportno as reportno, to_char(a.visit_dt, 'MM/DD/YYYY') as visit_dt, a.TECHNICIAN as technician, (select name from mscarsms where div = #{div} and car_id = a.ev_car) as ev_car, a.cust_cd as cust_cd, a.bill_to_cust as bill_to_cust, a.beg_ptc as beg_ptc, a.end_ptc as end_ptc, a.beg_noc as beg_noc, a.end_noc as end_noc, a.site_cd as site_cd, a.site_name as site_name, a.address as address, a.city as city, a.state as state, a.zip as zip, to_char(a.wt_ci1,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_ci1, to_char(a.wt_co1,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_co1, to_char(a.wt_ci2,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_ci2, to_char(a.wt_co2,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_co2, to_char(a.wt_ci3,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_ci3, to_char(a.wt_co3,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_co3, to_char(a.wt_ci4,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_ci4, to_char(a.wt_co4,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_co4, to_char(a.wt_ci5,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_ci5, to_char(a.wt_co5,'mm/dd/yyyy hh24:mi:ss') as wt_co5, a.hotel_night as hotel_noght, a.hotel_amt as hotel_amt, a.mileage as mileage, a.rental_amt as rental_amt, a.others_amt as others_amt, nvl(((a.wt_co1 - a.wt_ci1) * 1440), 0) as wt1, nvl(((a.wt_co2 - a.wt_ci2) * 1440), 0) as wt2, nvl(((a.wt_co3 - a.wt_ci3) * 1440), 0) as wt3, nvl(((a.wt_co4 - a.wt_ci4) * 1440), 0) as wt4, nvl(((a.wt_co5 - a.wt_ci5) * 1440), 0) as wt5, (select fname || ' ' || lname from msuserms where div = #{div} and user_id = a.create_id) as prepared, (select fname || ' ' || lname from msuserms where div = #{div} and user_id = a.reviewd) as approved from sitevrhd a where div=#{div} and reportno=#{reportno}

SELECT a.div, a.reportno, a.seq, a.dispenser_id, a.serialno, a.model_no, a.work_order, a.visit_reason, decode(e.sow, null, a.action_detail, e.sow) as action_detail, a.action_performed, a.partcode, a.partsname, a.qty, a.issues_found, a.vehicle, a.frequency, a.result, a.cable_type, a.times, a.new_error, a.hmi, a.nayax, a.rf_reader, a.ver_check, a.pcdpcomm_am, a.pcdpcomm_as, a.rv_schedule, a.rv_reason, a.rv_partcode, a.rv_partname, (select name from mscarsms where div = #{div} and car_id = a.vehicle) as car, a.part1_cd, b.part_name as part1_nm, a.part1_qty, a.part2_cd, c.part_name as part2_nm, a.part2_qty, a.part3_cd, d.part_name as part3_nm, a.part3_qty, f.case_no FROM sitevrdt a LEFT OUTER JOIN mspartms b on b.div = a.div and b.part_no = a.part1_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN mspartms c on c.div = a.div and c.part_no = a.part2_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN mspartms d on d.div = a.div and d.part_no = a.part3_cd LEFT OUTER JOIN fssowmsg e on e.div = a.div and e.transaction_no = a.reportno and e.wo_no = a.work_order LEFT OUTER JOIN fstranel f on f.div = a.div and f.wo_no = a.work_order WHERE a.div = #{div} AND a.reportno = #{reportno} ORDER BY a.seq
SELECT div, reportno, seq, dispenser_id, schedule, reason, part_cd FROM sitefwr WHERE div = #{div} AND reportno = #{reportno} ORDER BY seq
SELECT div, reportno, img_seq, img_nm, img_path, img_desc FROM sitevriu WHERE div = #{div} AND reportno = #{reportno} ORDER BY img_seq
